scripts.install:all: pnpm install --ignore-scripts --filter='!@threlte/gltf' && pnpm run build --filter='@threlte/preprocess' --force && pnpm install --no-ignore-scripts
scripts.install:packages: pnpm install --ignore-scripts --filter='!./apps/*' && pnpm run build --filter='@threlte/preprocess' --force && pnpm install --filter='!./apps/*' --no-ignore-scripts
